Improvements.Improvement: Use StringBuilder instead of String concatenation
Improvements.Description: Instead of using String concatenation which creates new String object each time, use StringBuilder which is more efficient in terms of memory and speed.

Improvements.Improvement: Use try-catch for each individual operation
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a single try-catch block for multiple operations, use separate try-catch blocks. This will make it easier to understand and handle exceptions.
